description: Fit cutie Adrian Hart is just trying to be helpful, offering to carry in some groceries for a woman in need. When he gets into the woman's house and meets her son, the athletic brown-eyed Michael Boston, he gets so uncontrollably horny that he starts masturbating with a cucumber. Michael spies on him, jerking his big curved cock while watching from around the corner! It's not long before these two horny dudes can't resist any longer and start fucking rught there in the kitchen, which Michael's mother is... not thrilled about.
title: A Helping Handful
